FuncDef: This command configures the mapping of the system forwarding class to the MLPPP classes for this profile. There is a many-to-one relationship between the system forwarding class and an MLPPP class.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the forwarding class name. Values-b3, l2, af, l1, h2, ef, h1, nc.
Specifies the class ID. Values-0 to 3.
